fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to update Case Owner to Business Critical Support Queue when a response is not provided by Designated Engineer within the specific time period.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_AssignToBusinessCriticalSupportQueue

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send First Email Notification for Case Resolution not provided within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_CaseResolutionViolationReminder-1

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send Second Email Notification for Case Resolution not provided within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_CaseResolutionViolationReminder-2

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send Email Notification when "No Assignment from NCR/JTP Queue" to an agent within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_NoAgentAssignmentNotification

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send Email Notification when "First response is not received from the Business Critical Support Queue" within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_NoAssignmentfromBusinessCriticalQueue

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send Email Notification when "First response is not received from NCR/JTP Agent" within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_NoResponseFromAgentReminder

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send First Email Notification when "No response received from Designated Engineer" within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_NoResponseFromDEReminder-1

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is responsible to send Second Email Notification when "No response received from Designated Engineer" within the specific time.
fieldUpdates.name: CM_NoResponseFromDEReminder-2

fieldUpdates.description: SDS-1402 : 3. When a case is closed by the Customer Set Incident Status value to "Closed" and Status value to "Closed"
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud Inc Status Closed

fieldUpdates.description: SDS-1402 : 4. Set Incident Substatus value to "Customer Closer"
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud Inc SubStatus Cust Closure

fieldUpdates.description: This field update sets Trigger Action field value to "Escalate Case".
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud: Set Trigger Action

fieldUpdates.description: Set Site Survey Complete Date to current date, when Site Survey Status is set to Approved
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud : SiteSurvey Complete Date

fieldUpdates.description: Set Site Survey Start Date when Site Survey Status is set to Awaiting Customers
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud : Site Survey Start Date

fieldUpdates.description: Update "Last Status Date/Time" whenever Case Status is changed.
fieldUpdates.name: Service Cloud: Update Last Status DT

fieldUpdates.description: Populate Submitted by User Role field value from the user to an Internal case
fieldUpdates.name: Service: Set Submitted By Role Field

fieldUpdates.description: Set Other Support Program field value to Tesla
fieldUpdates.name: Set Other Support Program to Tesla

fieldUpdates.description: Set Product Family for Tesla Cases
fieldUpdates.name: Set Product Family for Tesla Cases

fieldUpdates.description: This field update sets Trigger Action field value to "Escalate Case".
fieldUpdates.name: Trigger Escalation

fieldUpdates.description: SDS-1844 Service: Block Email-to-Case for EAR Restricted Accounts
fieldUpdates.formula: 'Case belongs to account/domain related to EAR Restricted Account.'
fieldUpdates.name: Update Generic Queue Reason for Invalid

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Case Closed Notification to Customer
rules.description: Service Cloud : Case Closed Notification to Customers with Survey link
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") && $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && if(Account.Billing_Region_Text__c = "JAPAN", False, True) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Product_Family__c,"Tesla HW Family") || ISPICKVAL(Product_Family__c,"Tesla SW Family")) && NOT(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='ESP_Invalid_Case_Queue') && NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.Email))

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Case Closed Notification to Customer_Japan
rules.description: Service Cloud : Case Closed Notification to Customers with Survey link

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Case Closed Notification to WebEmail
rules.description: Service Cloud : Case Closed Notification to Customers with Survey link
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") && $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && if(Account.Billing_Region_Text__c = "JAPAN", False, True) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Product_Family__c,"Tesla HW Family") || ISPICKVAL(Product_Family__c,"Tesla SW Family") ) && NOT(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='ESP_Invalid_Case_Queue') && ( ISBLANK(ContactId) || ISBLANK(Contact.Email) ) && NOT(ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail))

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Case Closed Notification to WebEmail_Japan
rules.description: Service Cloud : Case Closed Notification to Customers with Survey link
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") && $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && if(Account.Billing_Region_Text__c = "JAPAN", True, False) && ( ISBLANK(ContactId) || ISBLANK(Contact.Email) ) && NOT(ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail))

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Case Comment from NVIDIA Agents to Customer
rules.description: Service Cloud : Case Comment from NVIDIA Agents to Customer
rules.formula: ( NOT(ISBLANK(Case_Comment__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Case_Comment__c)) && ISCHANGED(Case_Comment__c) ) && ( Case_Comment_Owner__c <> "NPN Partner Community(LOGIN)" && Case_Comment_Owner__c <> "NPN Partner Community(NAMED)" && Case_Comment_Owner__c <> "Community Lite Profile" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A New Case created %3A Notification to Customer
rules.description: Service Cloud : New Case created : Notification to Customer

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Notification for No Activity from DE
rules.description: This is a time based workflow rule to send Email when there is no Activity on Case by Designated Engineer.

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Populate Site Survey Start Date
Service Cloud %3A Set Time Assigned to L3
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Incident_Status__c , "Enterprise Support") && ISBLANK ( Time_Assigned_to_L3__c ) && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Community_User_Record_Type"

rules.fullName: Service Cloud %3A Site Survey Approved
Service Cloud - Notify Case Owner Customer Closed Case
Service Cloud Invalid Case Queue Actions
rules.description: SDS-1844 Service: Block Email-to-Case for EAR Restricted Accounts

rules.fullName: Service Cloud Notify Case Team Case Closed
rules.description: SDS-2868 : Service: Case Teams for Enterprise Support Cases

rules.fullName: Service Cloud Notify Case Team NV Ticket Created
rules.description: SDS-2868 Service: Case Teams for Enterprise Support Cases

rules.fullName: Service Cloud Notify Case Team New Email Received
rules.description: SDS-2868 Service: Case Teams for Enterprise Support Cases

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Case Comment from Customer to NVIDIA Agents
rules.description: Service Cloud: Case Comment from Customer to NVIDIA Agents

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Escalate DE Case to ESP L3
rules.description: This is a time based workflow rule to escalate the Case to ESP L3 when there is no Activity on Case by Designated Engineer for 3 hours.

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A New Case Notification for GFNA
Service Cloud%3A Notification for Email to Closed%2FInvalid Case
rules.description: This Workflow is responsible to send Email when a Email is received for Closed/Invalid Case.
rules.formula: AND( OR( (IsClosed = True && Days_Closed__c > 30), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "ESP_Invalid_Case_Queue" ), ISPICKVAL(Last_Activity_Type__c, "Email Message"), ISPICKVAL(Last_Activity_User_Type__c, "Customer"), TEXT(Last_Activity_Date__c) <> TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Last_Activity_Date__c)), RecordType.Name = "Community User Record Type" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Notification to Case Owner for New Attachment
rules.description: Service Cloud: Notification to Case Owner for New Attachment from Customer.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Last_Activity_Type__c, 'Attachment'), TEXT(Last_Activity_Date__c) <> TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Last_Activity_Date__c)), RecordType.Name = "Community User Record Type" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Notifications to Customer for New Attachment
rules.description: Service Cloud: Notifications to Customer for New Attachment from Internal user.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Last_Activity_Type__c, 'Attachment'), ISCHANGED(Last_Activity_Date__c), RecordType.Name = "Community User Record Type" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Notify Case Owner and Owner Manager
rules.description: This workflow is responsible to send Email to Case Owner when there is no response to Customer in two days.

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A SLA Notifications - For DE%26BCQ
rules.description: Service Cloud: Send Email Alerts to Andrew for updates from SLA (Entitlement) Process.
rules.formula: $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && PRIORVALUE(SLA_Text__c) <> SLA_Text__c && ( Milestone_Status__c = "No response form Designated Engineer" || Milestone_Status__c = "No Assignment from BusinessCriticalQueue" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A SLA Notifications - Owner%26SupportMgr
rules.description: Service Cloud: Send Email Alerts to CaseOwner and Support Managers for updates from SLA (Entitlement) Process.
rules.formula: $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && PRIORVALUE(SLA_Text__c) <> SLA_Text__c && ( Milestone_Status__c = "No response form Designated Engineer" || Milestone_Status__c = "Reassign to BusinessCriticalSupportQueue" || Milestone_Status__c = "No Assignment from BusinessCriticalQueue" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A SLA Notifications%3A Owner%26NCR%2FJTPMgr
rules.description: Service Cloud: Send Email Alerts to CaseOwner and NCR/JTP Managers for updates from SLA (Entitlement) Process.
rules.formula: $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && PRIORVALUE(SLA_Text__c) <> SLA_Text__c && ( Milestone_Status__c = "No Assignment from NCR-JTP Queue" || Milestone_Status__c = "No First response" || Milestone_Status__c = "Escalation Notification" || Milestone_Status__c = "Follow up escalation notification" )

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Tesla Case Automation Rules
rules.description: Automation rules for Tesla support cases

rules.fullName: Service Cloud%3A Update Last Status Date%2FTime
rules.description: This WF is responsible to update current date/time whenever Case Status changes.

rules.fullName: Service%3A Update Submitted by Role on Internal Case
